name: jira-orchestrator
description: Legacy Jira orchestration plugin - See plugins/jira-orchestrator for the authoritative version (7.5.0).

work.description: Start orchestrated work on issue (THE main command)

ship.description: One command: prepare → code → PR → review → merge

iterate.description: Fix review feedback, update PR, re-review

sprint.description: Sprint planning, metrics, quality, team capacity

triage.description: Triage and analyze Jira issue (deprecated - use work --triage)

advanced-orchestration-patterns.description: Implements sophisticated orchestration patterns including Blackboard, Circuit Breaker, Dynamic Replanning, Hierarchical Decomposition, and Saga patterns for resilient multi-agent coordination

agent-router.description: Dynamic agent discovery and routing - queries main registry to select specialized code agents based on Jira context, file patterns, and task keywords

approval-orchestrator.description: Multi-level approval workflow orchestrator with gates, escalation rules, delegation, and comprehensive audit trails for PR, deployment, and release approvals

batch-commit-processor.description: Process multiple commits in batch with time aggregation and comment deduplication

batch-processor.description: Processes bulk Jira operations with intelligent batching, rate limiting, rollback support, and comprehensive progress tracking

bulk-importer.description: Imports issues from CSV, Excel, and JSON files with field mapping, validation, duplicate detection, and comprehensive error handling

checkpoint-pr-manager.description: Manage incremental draft PRs during CODE phase when splitting strategy requires multiple PRs

code-quality-enforcer.description: Expert agent for enforcing SOLID principles, clean code standards, and architectural patterns across the codebase with automated analysis and refactoring suggestions

code-reviewer.description: Comprehensive code reviewer for orchestration workflow - deep analysis of logic, security, performance, accessibility, test coverage, and documentation quality before PR creation

commit-message-generator.description: Generates high-quality conventional commit messages from Jira issue context and git diff analysis

commit-tracker.description: Track commits, map them to Jira issues, and post detailed commit summaries with Confluence references

completion-flow-orchestrator.description: Orchestrates the complete task completion flow including sub-issue monitoring, gap analysis, Confluence documentation, commit creation, and issue commenting with full traceability

completion-orchestrator.description: Orchestrate the full completion workflow - PR creation, sub-item documentation, and QA transitions

compliance-reporter.description: Compliance reporting for SOC2, GDPR, ISO27001 with audit trails and evidence collection

council-coordinator.description: Coordinates agent council reviews using the blackboard pattern for collaborative multi-agent analysis

dependency-mapper.description: Cross-project dependency detection, visualization, impact analysis, circular dependency detection, critical path calculation, and blocking issue identification

draft-pr-manager.description: Create draft PR immediately after PLAN phase and update it throughout development for early visibility and feedback

escalation-manager.description: Manages issue escalation workflows with automated priority adjustments and stakeholder notifications

expert-agent-matcher.description: Advanced expertise matching system - Deep multi-dimensional analysis to select optimal experts with confidence scoring, team composition optimization, and load balancing

export-generator.description: Generates PDF reports, Excel/CSV exports, and JSON exports with custom templates, scheduling, and distribution capabilities

governance-auditor.description: Complete audit trail management for all decisions, compliance reporting, change log generation, access pattern analysis, risk assessment, and SOC2/ISO27001 evidence collection

policy-enforcer.description: Policy definition and evaluation engine for code quality gates, security requirements, review policies, branch protection, and compliance checks

portfolio-manager.description: Multi-project portfolio management with aggregated metrics, cross-project dependencies, resource allocation, strategic alignment, and executive-level reporting

pr-creator.description: Create high-quality pull requests with comprehensive documentation and Jira integration

release-coordinator.description: Multi-project release planning, release train management, automated release notes, rollback coordination, feature flag management, and go/no-go decision support

requirements-analyzer.description: Deep analysis of Jira issue requirements to ensure clarity, completeness, and testability before implementation begins

review-facilitator.description: Break down PR reviews into small, manageable tasks that can be reviewed independently in 5-15 minute chunks

sla-monitor.description: Real-time SLA monitoring with breach prediction, escalation triggers, and compliance dashboards

smart-commit-validator.description: Pre-flight validation of smart commit parameters to prevent failed commits and ensure data integrity

sprint-planner.description: Automated sprint planning with capacity calculation, velocity tracking, backlog prioritization, commitment suggestions, sprint health monitoring, and adaptive learning from past sprint outcomes

sub-item-documenter.description: Document implementation details on all Jira sub-items after work completion

code-review.description: Code review patterns and best practices
